sentences.en: 'sling Chamber - pot Tu out of the factory!
sentences.cn: “ 叫屠 夜壶 滚蛋!

sentences.en: 'sling Chien Pao - sheng out, as well!
sentences.cn: “ 叫钱葆生也滚出去!

sentences.en: " That's right! "'sling Chien Pao - sheng out and sling his stooge out with him!
sentences.cn: “ 不错,叫钱葆生滚出去! 钱葆生的走狗也滚出去!

sentences.en: Both pelvic and thoracic sling restraints are used.
sentences.cn: 用吊带约束髋部和胸部.

sentences.en: By using a hoist the movers were able to sling the piano to the third floor.
sentences.cn: 搬运工人用吊车才把钢琴吊到3楼.

sentences.en: Don't just sling your clothes on the floor.
sentences.cn: 不要把衣服往地板上一扔就不管了。

sentences.en: He had a small green backpack slung over one shoulder.
sentences.cn: 他把一只绿色小背包搭在一边肩上。

sentences.en: He had a stone in his sling.
sentences.cn: 并且把自己的弹弓装上了一块石头.

sentences.en: He had to keep his broken arm in a sling.
sentences.cn: 他不得不把断胳膊固定在吊带上.

sentences.en: Her right arm was in a sling.
sentences.cn: 她的右手臂用吊带吊着.

sentences.en: I saw him take off his anorak and sling it into the back seat.
sentences.cn: 我看见他把带帽防寒服脱下来扔在了后面的座位上。

sentences.en: I wasn't slinging off at your religion.
sentences.cn: 我不是在嘲笑你的宗教。

sentences.en: She had her arm in a sling.
sentences.cn: 她的胳臂吊在悬带上.

sentences.en: She slung her coat over her desk chair.
sentences.cn: 她把外衣搭在了桌椅背上。

sentences.en: She was back at work with her arm in a sling.
sentences.cn: 她胳膊上还吊着三角巾，就回来工作了。

sentences.en: The boy discharged a stone from a sling.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩用弹弓射石头.

sentences.en: The cylinder was lifted from the seabed in a sling.
sentences.cn: 圆筒用吊索吊离海底.

sentences.en: the slings and arrows of outrageous critics.
sentences.cn: 可恶的评论家的恶评。

sentences.en: They lowered the boxes into the cellar by a sling.
sentences.cn: 他们用吊索将箱子放进地窖.

sentences.en: They used slings of rope to lower us from one set of arms to another.
sentences.cn: 他们用几条绳索把我们从一组吊臂降到另外一组吊臂。

words.tran_cn: 投石者；吊物工人；摔砂造模机；吊环

phrases.phrase: put someone's (或 have one's) ass in a sling
phrases.tran_cn: (北美，粗俚)使处于不幸（或苦恼、困境）中
祸殃（指不利的因素、事态）

trans.tran_cn: 吊索，鞋带，投石器，投掷，[医]悬带
trans.tran_en: a piece of cloth tied around your neck to support an injured arm or hand
If you sling something over your shoulder or over something such as a chair, you hang it there loosely

trans.tran_cn: 吊起，悬挂，投掷，遣送，押往
